Package ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.strategies

Interface Summary
ICharacterDetectionStrategy Interface to describe an IStrategy detecting Characters out of the given MicroGestures and returning the detected Characters.
IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy Interface to describe a strategy detecting MicroGestures in the TouchPoints of the given MicroGestures and returning the detected MicroGestures.
IPostprocessingStrategy Interface to describe a strategy postprocessing a series of detected Characters.
IPreprocessingStrategy Interface to describe a strategy preprocessing a series of TouchPoints enclosed in a MicroGesture container and returning the processed points as one.
IStrategy Interface defining a strategy.
 

Class Summary
BaseStrategy Abstract Base Class for strategies.
CharacterDetectionStrategyDummyGraph Implementation of ICharacterDetectionStrategy using a VERY basic graph created by GraphFactoryDummy.
CharacterDetectionStrategyGraph Implementation of ICharacterDetectionStrategy using a graph created by an IGraphFactory.
CharacterDetectionStrategyManager Implementation of a manager for object implementing ICharacterDetectionStrategy.
CharacterDetectionStrategyNone Example of an implementation of ICharacterDetectionStrategy doing nothing, except returning the "Null"-Character.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyCircles Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which detects circles in the given MicroGestures.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyCombine Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which combines MicroGesture with others when needed.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyCurvature Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy that recognizes MicroGestures by changes in curvature.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyEdges Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which detects edges in the paths of the TouchPoints of the given MicroGestures.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyHalfCircle Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which detects half circles in the given MicroGestures.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyLines Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which detects lines in the given MicroGestures.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyLog Example of an implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which logs the given MicroGestures to Logcat and into a log-file and returns them unchanged
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyManager Implementation of a manager for object implementing IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyNone Example of an implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy doing nothing except returning the MicroGestures given to it.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyPrediction Deprecated.
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyRemoveTiny Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which removes all MicroGestures that do not meet its size requirements (that do not have enough points).
MicroGestureDetectionStrategySmoothing Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which applies an IPreprocessingStrategy to all given MicroGestures to smooth their points' path.
PathSmoothingStrategyAverage Implementation of IPreprocessingStrategy that smoothes the path of the given TouchPoints by calculating their average and adjusting them accordingly.
PathSmoothingStrategySpline Implementation of IPreprocessingStrategy that smoothes the path of the given TouchPoints by calculating a spline curve over them and adjusting them accordingly.
PostprocessingStrategyLog Example of an implementation of IPostprocessingStrategy which logs the given Characters to Logcat and into a log-file and returns them unchanged
PostprocessingStrategyManager Implementation of a manager for object implementing IProstprocessingStrategy.
PostprocessingStrategyNone Example of an implementation of IPostprocessingStrategy doing nothing except returning the Characters given to it.
PreprocessingStrategyLog Example of an implementation of IPreprocessingStrategy which logs the given TouchPoints to Logcat and into a log-file and returns them unchanged
PreprocessingStrategyManager Implementation of a manager for object implementing IPreprocessingStrategy.
PreprocessingStrategyNone Implementation of IPreprocessingStrategy doing nothing, except returning the Characters it was given.
PreprocessingStrategyNormalizePoints Implementation of IPreprocessingStrategy that normalizes the points of the path of the given TouchPoints.
StrategyManager<Strategy extends IStrategy> Abstract Base Class for a class managing objects implementing IStrategy.
